title: Scientists hoping harpoons can skewer space junk crisis
text:
Scientists hoping harpoons can skewer space junk crisis 12:41pm EDT - 02:01 
A European satellite launched this week to test our ability to tackle the growing amount of garbage in space it will deploy technology as familiar to ancient Rome as the astronaut - nets and harpoons. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A European satellite launched this week to test our ability to tackle the growing amount of garbage in space it will deploy technology as familiar to ancient Rome as the astronaut - nets and harpoons.
